EmailTemplate.name: Haystak Resolved Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Ticket # {!Case.CaseNumber} has been Resolved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Dealer Name: {!Case.Account} Support Ticket Subject: {!Case.Subject}
Status: Corrective Action Taken
Website Support's response to your request:
{!Case.Case_Resolution__c}
Please review this ticket to ensure that it has been resolved to your satisfaction. If the issue is not resolved:
access the customer portal and "Request an Update" on this ticket email websitesupport@vinsolutions.com contact us at the phone # below.
Thank you for choosing VinSolutions!
Your VinSolutions Support Team (800) 980-7488 websitesupport@vinsolutions.com
We value your feedback, please click here to take our survey.
